securityRegulations.title: SECURITY REGULATIONS
securityRegulations.intro: Security Regulations Announcement covering matters that must be observed and complied with by applicants visiting ZovPersonal Visa Application Centers;
securityRegulations.description: In accordance with the security requirements of German/Italian representations, applicants visiting ZovPersonal offices are prohibited from performing the following actions and bringing and using the specified items in ZovPersonal offices:
prohibitedItems: Mobile phones, cameras, video cameras or any other devices that record audio/video (mp3 readers/players, portable computers, battery-powered recording devices, etc.)
All kinds of flammable (matches, lighters, fuel and similar combustible) and cutting (scissors, pencil sharpeners, files, etc.) objects
Weapons or weapon-like objects or any explosive materials
Bags or suitcases larger than cabin size, backpacks, briefcases or zippered bags (If you have files, you can only keep files containing the requested documents)
securityRegulations.disclaimer: *The above list is not limited to those specified.
additionalRules: Security guards and office officials have the right to prohibit suspicious items and refuse entry to suspicious persons to our offices. Security guards have the authority to check the applicant's bag at any time during the visa application process.

For security reasons, third parties such as friends, relatives or workplace employees other than the applicant are prohibited from entering visa applications (Entry to ZovPersonal offices is not possible except for the applicant and the person who will apply by proxy). Only 1 person will be accepted to accompany applicants who physically need someone else's help, have hearing impairments or cannot read and write.
Applicants are prohibited from entering areas other than the common areas reserved for applicants in our offices (staff work areas, toilets, etc.).

ZovPersonal offices do not have any place to store the prohibited items mentioned above. ZovPersonal offices also do not accept deposits. Applicants are requested to choose alternative ways not to bring such characteristics and types of items with them before entering the center.
ZovPersonal offices are recorded with cameras 24/7 due to our security policy.

dataProtection.title: GENERAL INFORMATION TEXT ON THE PROTECTION AND PROCESSING OF PERSONAL DATA
dataProtection.intro: As ZovPersonal Consulting and Service Foreign Trade Inc. ("ZovPersonal" or "Company"), we show maximum sensitivity to the security of your personal data. With this awareness, we attach great importance to the processing and storage of personal data belonging to natural persons with whom the Company interacts in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 ("Law"), secondary regulations (regulations, communiquÃ©s, circulars) that have been and will be put into effect based on the Law, and binding decisions taken and to be taken by the Personal Data Protection Board.

dataController.title: Information About the Data Controller
dataController.content: ZovPersonal CONSULTING AND SERVICE FOREIGN TRADE INC., registered with the Istanbul Trade Registry Directorate, is the Data Controller in accordance with the Law.

processingPurposes.title: Purposes of Processing Personal Data
processingPurposes.content: Your personal data is processed by the Company for the purposes of carrying out the necessary work by the Company's business units and conducting activities in this direction for the fulfillment of the Company's commercial activities in accordance with legislation and Company policies, determining, planning and implementing the Company's short, medium and long-term commercial policies, fulfilling the Company's obligations arising from relevant legislation, managing customer relations and corporate communication processes, managing service sales processes, managing call center processes, and ensuring the commercial and legal security of natural and legal persons with whom the Company has business relations, within the limits specified in the Law, in accordance with the law, honesty rules, and always in a connected, limited and proportionate manner with these purposes.

dataTransfer.title: Transfer of Personal Data
dataTransfer.content: Your personal data is transferred within the scope of the above-mentioned purposes, in accordance with the conditions specified in Articles 8 and 9 of the Law, primarily to legally authorized public institutions, judicial and administrative authorities, private law legal entities and natural persons permitted by other legislation, institutions and organizations authorized to audit the Company, payment institutions contracted for the fulfillment of payments and financial obligations, business partners from whom services are received or with whom cooperation is established for the fulfillment of services provided through the call center and for the conduct and development of the Company's activities, and only when necessary to the Company's suppliers, by taking the data security measures specified in the Law.

collectionMethod.title: Method and Legal Basis for Collecting Personal Data
collectionMethod.content: Your personal data is collected by the Company's authorized units and employees through automatic and non-automatic methods, verbally, in writing or in electronic environment. In this context, personal data in the categories of identity, communication, location, legal transaction, customer transaction, transaction security, risk management, finance are processed based on the legal reasons of processing personal data belonging to the parties of the contract being mandatory due to being directly related to the establishment or performance of a contract shown in the second paragraph of Article 5 of the Law, processing data being mandatory for the data controller to fulfill its legal obligation, being made public by the data subject himself, and processing data being mandatory for the legitimate interests of the Company, provided that it does not harm the fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject.

dataSubjectRights.title: Rights of Data Subjects Under the Law
dataSubjectRights.intro: You can apply to ZovPersonal at any time to:
rights: Learn whether your personal data is being processed
Request information about this if your personal data has been processed
Learn the purpose of processing your personal data and whether they are used in accordance with their purpose
Know the third parties to whom your personal data is transferred domestically or abroad
Request correction of incomplete or incorrectly processed personal data
Request deletion or destruction of personal data within the framework of the conditions stipulated in Article 7 of the Law
Request that the operations carried out in accordance with subparagraphs (d) and (e) of Article 11 of the Law be notified to third parties to whom your personal data has been transferred
Object to the emergence of a result against you through the analysis of your processed data exclusively through automated systems
Request compensation for damages in case you suffer damage due to illegal processing of your personal data
dataSubjectRights.applicationProcess: You can request to exercise your rights. You can submit your requests regarding your rights and the application of the Law by filling out the application form that you can obtain from https://zovpersonal.com/ and sending it to the company address via notary, registered mail with return receipt or with your personal application in wet signature form, or by signing the application form you filled out electronically with your mobile signature or secure electronic signature and then sending it to info@zovpersonal.com using your KEP address or the e-mail address already registered in the Company's data recording system.
dataSubjectRights.fees: ZovPersonal will respond to requests in this scope free of charge up to ten pages if a written response is to be given; it will respond by charging a fee for each page over ten pages per transaction. If the response to the application is given on a recording medium such as CD or flash memory, the fee that may be requested by the Company cannot exceed the cost of the recording medium.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We answer everything you wonder about visa and immigration processes. Find your path to your dream country with our expert team.
faq.question1: Which countries do you provide visa consulting for?
faq.answer1: We provide comprehensive visa consulting services for Germany, Australia, Canada, USA, UK, Netherlands, and many EU countries. We create tailored solutions for each country's unique requirements.
faq.question2: How long does the visa application process take?
faq.answer2: Duration varies by country and visa type, typically ranging from 2-6 months. Complete preparation of documents and following correct procedures accelerates the process.
faq.question3: What do you do if the application is rejected?
faq.answer3: In case of rejection, we analyze the reasons and develop a new strategy. If necessary, we handle appeal processes and prepare new applications after addressing deficiencies. We continue supporting our clients throughout the process.
faq.answer4: Our fees vary according to service type and complexity. Initial consultation is free. Contact us for detailed pricing and personalized quotes based on your specific needs.
faq.question5: In which languages should my documents be prepared?
faq.answer5: Documents must be translated into the official language of the target country. We also provide certified translation services for German, English, and other required languages.

architectureSection.subtitle: Everything you need to know
architectureSection.title: Work process in Germany
architectureSection.description: Germany is known for its strong economy, culture and high quality of life. However, for immigrants, moving to Germany means more than just a new career; it is the beginning of a new life in a new environment.

integration.title: Employee integration
integration.description: After international employees successfully reach Germany, the critical process of integration begins. Good integration is important not only to ensure that new employees feel comfortable in their new environment, but also to ensure long-term commitment to the company.

experiencedVisa.title: Visa for experienced professionals
experiencedVisa.description: What is an experienced professional visa? The visa for experienced professionals (Section 19c of the Residence Act, Paragraph 2) is aimed at skilled workers who have at least two years of qualified professional experience in their field but do not have a formal university degree.

acceleratedProcedures.title: Accelerated procedures
acceleratedProcedures.description: What is the accelerated skilled worker procedure? The Accelerated Skilled Worker Procedure is a special process developed to accelerate the immigration and recognition process for skilled workers from abroad.

recruitment.title: Recruitment
recruitment.description: Step by step. Recruiting international specialists offers a tremendous opportunity to address the skills shortage in Germany. However, for this process to be successful, companies need to adopt a targeted and structured approach.

hero.title: National Work Visa Application Process
hero.description: The national work visa grants the right to enter Germany for long-term stays for work purposes. Depending on the type of work, the visa is issued with a validity period of up to one year. After entering the country, you usually need to apply for a domestic residence permit. This visa type is only valid for specific job positions and does not grant freedom of movement in the Schengen area.

appointmentSystem.title: Appointment System
appointmentSystem.description: Appointments are given through the national appointment system
appointmentSystem.serviceDescription: We handle the appointment procedures for you. We make the necessary appointments and carry out the procedures. Required documents will be requested from you and organized, then we follow up on the process.

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.description: Use the online appointment system for national visas to learn about your purpose of stay and the documents you need to submit. Register on the appointment waiting list for your purpose of stay through the online appointment system for a fee.

application.title: Application
application.description1: Due to the involvement of German internal authorities in the process, document processing will typically take up to three months (or longer in some cases). If you need your passport during the evaluation process of your application, you can contact the relevant visa department by stating your application number in your signed written petition.
application.description2: Service fee must be paid. After your fingerprints are taken, your passport and required documents are received by the visa department for the evaluation process.

afterEvaluation.title: After Evaluation
afterEvaluation.description: Immediately after the evaluation process of applications is completed, your passport is returned to you in an envelope along with some original documents you submitted, either to their offices or directly by mail.

note.label: Note:
note.text: Pricing is per person, and the process varies according to file and document variety and visa type.

importantInfo.title: Important Information
importantInfo.description: Before applying, please plan for the appointment waiting time and the time required to return your passport.

decisionAuthority.title: Decision Authority
decisionAuthority.description: The decision to approve or reject the application is made only by the Foreign Representations.

holidayEffect.title: Holiday Effect
holidayEffect.description: Processing times may vary due to Turkish and German official holidays. Therefore, we recommend applying for a visa at an early date.

applicationTracking.title: Application Tracking
applicationTracking.description: You can track what stage your application is at by contacting us.
